LanguageData.GrenadeHE.label: 대폭렬탄
LanguageData.GrenadeHE.description: The high-explosive charge detonates on impact, scattering lethal shell fragments in a large area.
LanguageData.GrenadeEMP.label: EMP
LanguageData.GrenadeEMP.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.
LanguageData.GrenadeIncendiary.label: 소이탄
LanguageData.GrenadeIncendiary.description: Filled with incendiary agent. The agent is dispersed on impact, covering the area in flames.
